description: This file defines an ASP.NET Core Web API controller named `SchedulingController`. It provides endpoints for scheduling social media posts, listing scheduled posts, canceling scheduled posts, and listing published posts. It interacts with a scheduling service (`ISchedulingService`) to perform backend operations and exposes REST API routes under the 'api/scheduling' path.

classes.name: SchedulingController
classes.description: Controller class providing API endpoints for scheduling social media posts, managing scheduled posts, and listing published posts.

methods.name: Schedule
methods.description: Creates a new scheduled post for a connected social account.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Retrieves a list of scheduled posts for the current user, optionally filtered by social account ID.

methods.name: Cancel
methods.description: Cancels a scheduled post by its ID.

methods.name: ListPublished
methods.description: Lists published posts for the current user, optionally filtered by social account ID.
